page.title: 16Favourite T.V. Programmes
page.content: These are the favourite programmes of the children in our class:{BBC1-}Clint Eastwood, Blue Peter, Doctor Kildare, Dallas, Top of the Pops, Fame, Dynasty, East Enders, Canonball Run, Wonder Women, Grange Hill, Lay on Five and Young Ones.{BBC2-}Tennis, Cricket and Snooker.{ITV-}Inspector Gadget, Starwars, Superman, (A)Team, Coronation Street, Grease 1 and 2, Arthur Clark's World of Mysterious Powers, Fankenstien, Raiders of the Lost Ark, Charles Bronson films, Vicky, Battle Beyond the Stars, Hotel and World of Sport.{Channel 4- Avengers, Crosby Family.{Helen Taylor likes Doctor Kildare because it has some romantic parts and it tells you what a doctor has to do.{Suzanna {Branagh}likes the Avengers because it is very exciting and they always solve the mystery.
